sentences.en: Academically, Huamei - Bond students are very successful at Trent University.
sentences.cn: 从学术上说, 中加高中的学生在我们特伦特大学是非常成功的.

sentences.en: At length, pushing away his plate, Warren Trent observed.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特终于推开盘子开口了.

sentences.en: Despite scepticism, founder Trent Huang was no - nonsensical and confident about his company.
sentences.cn: 不过, 创办人黄川在介绍“咿呀.com” 的时候,却满是严肃和自信.

sentences.en: For Tom and Trent, the trap demonstration was a setup on a stage.
sentences.cn: 对汤姆和特伦特来说，这只是个设置在舞台上的陷阱。

sentences.en: He had fallen , Warren Trent realized , for an ancient , elementary gambit.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特觉得自己已为这个起码的老一套计谋所骗了.

sentences.en: I'm going to take you to the bank, Senator Trent.
sentences.cn: 特伦特参议员,我要把你带到银行去.

sentences.en: I'm just gonna take Trent to play some basketball.
The Trent River Authority at least is on the side of depollution.
sentences.cn: 至少特棱特河川当局是赞成防止污染的.

sentences.en: This action was not lost on Trent.
sentences.cn: 这种举动对吐伦特颇能发生一点影响.

sentences.en: Trent returned to the counter and his biscuits and gravy.
sentences.cn: 特伦特回到柜台旁,那儿放着他点的烤饼与肉卤.

sentences.en: Trent would like to see the technology spread among companies as an open-source solution.
sentences.cn: 特伦特希望该技术可以作为一种开源的解决方案在公司间共享。

sentences.en: Turning to Peter, she snapped, " I insist on a full report being made to Mr. Trent. "
sentences.cn: 她转向彼得, 气势汹汹地说, “ 一定得把经过详细报告特伦特先生. ”

sentences.en: Viciously, Warren Trent stubbed out his cigar.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特恶狠狠地捻熄了雪茄.

sentences.en: Warren Trent gave a satisfied grunt.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特满意地咕噜了一声.

sentences.en: Warren Trent gripped the arms of his chair tightly.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特紧紧地抓着他椅子的扶手.
沃伦·特伦特微笑着迎上前去.

sentences.en: Warren Trent's forefinger stabbed the document between them on the bar.
sentences.cn: 沃伦·特伦特的食指指着酒柜上放在他们之间的那份报告.
